timeline.message:
NXP-29688: override the command if not redefined when running in dev environment

When running the Docker image with NUXEO_ENVIRONMENT=dev, override
the command so that we can exec nuxeoctl commands inside the container
without killing it.

timeline.message:
NXP-29688: override the command if not redefined when running in dev environment

When running the Docker image with NUXEO_ENVIRONMENT=dev, override
the command so that we can exec nuxeoctl commands inside the container
without killing it.

without killing it.

NXP-29688: override the command if not redefined when running in dev environment

When running the Docker image with NUXEO_ENVIRONMENT=dev, override
the command so that we can exec nuxeoctl commands inside the container
without killing it.

NXP-29688: allow to run the Docker image in dev mode

When running the Docker image with NUXEO_DEV=true:
- enable Nudeo dev mode (org.nuxeo.dev property).
- override the command so that we can exec nuxeoctl commands
inside the container without killing it.

NXP-29688: allow to run the Docker image in dev mode

When running the Docker image with NUXEO_DEV=true:
- enable Nudeo dev mode (org.nuxeo.dev property).
- override the command so that we can exec nuxeoctl commands
inside the container without killing it.
